instruction: Generate a list of 4 user stories associated with this project.
input: [Project description] A mobile app for an online streaming service
output:
1. As a user, I want to see a list of popular movies and shows from the streaming service so that I can quickly find something to watch. 
2. As a user, I want to be able to search for movies and shows by specific criteria so that I can find exactly what I am looking for.
3. As a user, I want to be able to save movies and shows to my favorites list so that I can quickly access them for viewing.
4. As a user, I want to be able to access my account across multiple devices so that I can easily start watching a movie or show at home, and continue watching it on my phone while I am on the go.
